Hoy su mentalidad ha cambiado y aunque sabe que no tiene dinero, sus ganas de salir adelante se han antepuesto, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito para pagar la capacitación en cocina express y montar su propio negocio. 
Sueña con crecer dentro del sector de comidas rápidas y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosalba, 48, is the single mother of two children. Her economic situation has always been her greatest challenge, which is why she has worked hard to offer her children a decent life and good education. She says that gastronomy has been one of her biggest passions, but due to economic factors her dreams have always been seen as unattainable. 

Today her mentality has changed and even though she knows she does not have the money, her desire to get ahead has taken precedence, which is why she finds herself requesting a loan to pay for training in express cooking so she can start her own business. She dreams of growing within the fast food sector and improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for training in express cooking

loans.name: Ramón

texts.es:
Ramón tiene 68 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos hijos. Es una persona que hace 50 años realiza trabajos agrícolas, hoy en día lo hace en compañía de su hijo.  

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para reparar el tractor que posee y con el cual trabaja la tierra y la otra parte la utilizara para reparar el cerco donde se encuentra sus cultivos. De esta manera, Ramón podrá brindar a sus clientes un buen servicio, porque con el tractor prepara la tierra de otras personas que pagan por sus servicios. Teniendo su fuente se ingresos segura, podrá brindarles a su hijos lo mejor como educación, salud y vivienda.
texts.en:
Ramón is 68 years old, he is married and he has two children. He has been a farmer for 50 years, and today he works with his son.

A part of the loan he is requesting to Fundación Campo will be used to repair the tractor he owns and that he uses to work on his land; another part will be used to repair the fence around his crops. Ramón will thus succeed in offering a good service to his customers, as he also uses his tractor to prepare other farmers’ lands and he gets paid for this service. Having a steady source of income he will succeed in granting his children the best education, good health and better living conditions.

loans.use: To rapair his tractor and the fence around his crops.

loans.name: Jose  Maria

texts.es: Jose es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos de 8, 6 y 3 años de edad,  se dedica a ser agricultor siembra maíz y también trabaja de jornal en una finca que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas y el pago de su trabajo logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar. Jose  desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso a solicitado un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, entre otras cosas, para seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en: Jose is a very responsible man when it comes to his household obligations, as his main characteristic has always been providing the best to his family. He currently lives with his wife and their 3 children ages 8, 6 and 3. He is a corn farmer and he also works as a day laborer in a farm located close to his community. He succeeds in paying for his household’s expenses thanks to the income he earns from his sales and the salary from his job. Jose wants to increase his sales and for this reason he has requested a loan that he will use to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers and other products in order to keep on providing his family with their basic necessities on a daily basis.

loans.use: To buy seeds, manure and fertilizers.

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
JOSE tiene 50 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con unos familiares en la ciudad de Chimbo Provicia de Bolívar.

José es mecánico Automotriz. Solicita el dinero para comprar torno, playo, desarmador, llaves. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los materiakles que necesita para trabajar. Las compras las realizará en la ciudad de Guaranda. El sueño es mejorar el nivel de vida. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es la competencia y la falta de recursos económicos. En el tiempo libre le gustya jugar boli.
texts.en:
José is 50 years old, he is single and has no children, and he lives with some relatives in the town of Chimbo, in the Bolívar province.
José is an auto mechanic. He is requesting a loan to buy winding drums, pliers, screwdrivers and wrenches. Thanks to this loan he will succeed in buying the materials he needs to work. He will buy the tools in the town of Guaranda. He dreams of improving his standard of living. Competition and the lack of economic resources are the challenges he has to face. In his free time he likes playing bowling.

loans.use: To buy winding drums, pliers, screwdrivers and wrenches.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is a 39-year-old married man with four children. He is a self-employed businessman who deals in rental houses. He has a number of rental rooms and has been in this business for over 13 years.

Robert has applied for 5,000,000 (five million shillings), which he wants to use to complete the floors and paint the interior of his rental apartments (shown in the photo), so that he can get tenants to move in. 

He plans to use the income that will be collected from the new rental units to pay back the loan and use the savings to build more rooms. His dream is to one day be self-sufficient, not relying on loans to construct the apartments.

loans.use: to complete his rental units.

loans.name: Ronanisa

texts.en:
Ronanisa is a seaweed farmer from the town of Bien Unido, Bohol. She is a married woman and has three children. Ronanisa has been in the business for more than five years now. She helps her husband in their venture.

Ronanisa is asking for a loan to buy more seaweed seedlings. With a loan, she will be able to improve her business and augment her income. Ronanisa dreams of making their seaweed business a sustainable one.

loans.use: to buy more seaweed seedlings.

loans.name: Jorge Mario

texts.es: Don Jorge de 42 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos en casa propia,  el se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 20 años su principal siembra es el maíz y frijol cuando ya tiene lista su cosecha la almacena en los graneros y sacos que muestra la fotografía para luego salir y comercializarlos en los puestos de compra-venta de granos básicos, con las ganancias de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Don Jorge solicita un crédito para poder comprar semillas, fertilizantes,  herbicidas, abonos, etc. seguir su siembra para llevar el pan diario  a su hogar.
texts.en: 42-year-old Jorge lives with his wife and his three children in a house that he owns. He has worked in farming for the past 20 years. His main crops are corn and beans. Once he's done harvesting, he stores the produce in the containers and sacks that are shown in the photo. Then he goes out and sells it at places that buy and sell essential grains. The profits he makes from his sales allow him to afford some of the expenses in his household. Jorge requests a loan in order to purchase seeds, fertilizer, herbicide, compost, etc., so that he can continue to sow and provide the daily bread for his family.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer, herbicide, compost, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El cliente vive en Guayaquil.  Esto lo aprendió en los talleres de centro médico de rehabilitación donde se hacía atender hace 25 años atrás, es a hacer muletas, prótesis para extremidades etc. Lo realiza con su esposa desde las 8h00 hasta las 18h00.

Su dificultad es que padece de una enfermedad en la columna que no le permite movilizarse con facilidad. Es casado, su esposa se dedica a los Cáceres de la casa. Tienen un hijo q estudia en colegio fiscal. 

Su sueño es formalizar su negocio y también tener un bazar para que lo atienda su esposa y así poder tener más ingreso para su casa. Con el préstamo quiere comprar metal, madera, plásticos para hacer mas prótesis.
texts.en:
This client lives in Guayaquil.  He learned how to make crutches, prosthetic devices, etc. at the medical center’s rehabilitation center he attended 25 years ago; he does this with his wife from 8am until 6pm.

The difficulty he faces is a disease of the spine that keeps him from being able to move easily.  He’s married and his wife does the household chores.  He has a son attending public school.

His dream is to formalize his business and also to have a clothing store his wife can run thus earning more household income.  He wants to use the loan to buy metal, wood and plastics to make more prosthetic devices.

loans.use: to buy metal, lumber and plastics.

loans.name: Santa Teresa Group

texts.es:
El comité Santa Teresa es de la cuidad de Carapeguá, actualmente el comité se encuentra en el 1º ciclo con  7 integrantes, son señoritas trabajadoras que se esmeran en progresar. Se dedican exclusivamente cada una en sus respectivas actividades con deseo de incrementar sus ganancias y cumplir con sus responsabilidades, y por medio de ese trabajo también poder ayudar a sus familias.
Leticia, una de las miembros, se dedica a la elaboración de artesanías, ella es una joven muy trabajadora que quiere salis adelante, es por eso que se está esforzando y luchando. Su meta es poder ser el día de mañana una gran microempresaria y dar a su familia lo que necesitan.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de telas, hilos, gomas, pinturas y demás, para seguir con sus artesanías.
texts.en:
The Santa Teresa communal bank is from the city of Carapeguá.  The communal bank is currently in their first cycle with seven members.  They are hard-working young women who are working hard to progress.

Each one of them devotes themselves exclusively to their respective business activities with the desire to increase their profits and to fulfill their responsibilities.  Through this work they also wish to be able to help their families.

Leticia is one of the members.  She makes handicrafts.  She is a very hard-working young woman who wants to get ahead.  That is why she is putting forth great effort and struggling.  Her goal is to be able to be a great small businesswoman in the future and to give her family what they need.

She is requesting this loan to buy fabric, thread, elastic, paint, and the rest in order to continue with her handicrafts.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, elastic, paint, and the rest.

loans.name: Jose Rosalio

texts.es: Jose, tiene 49 años de edad, es casado, tiene 5 hijos y vive en una aldea del municipio de Jesús de Otoro, Comayagua. El se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 10 años, donde produce y vende café. Esta producción la vende en el mercado local.  Esta solicitando un tercer préstamo que es por 16,000 lempiras  con el cual va continuar con el mantenimiento a su finca de café, comprara fertilizantes y abonos para poder sacar mejor producción. Su plan de mantener asistida su finca es para poder ayudar a sus hijos con las necesidades básicas.
texts.en:
Jose, age 49, is married and has five children.  He lives in a village in the Jesús de Otoro municipality in Comayagua.

He has been farming for ten years.  He produces and sells coffee.  He sells this production at the local market.

He is requesting a third loan for 16,000 lempiras, which he will use for maintenance of his coffee farm.  He will buy fertilizers and manure in order to be able to get better production.  His plan to keep up his farm is to be able to help his children with the basic needs.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers for the maintenance of his coffee farm.

loans.name: Lafia Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Lafia est composé de sept  femmes qui sont majoritairement des mariées et monogames. Elles ont en moyenne 34 ans et 3 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans la ville de Ségou (4ème Région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens  de voisinage et de parenté et leurs activités génératrices de revenu. Elles font le petit commerce d’habit, de friperie,  de poissons, et d’arachide. Dans le but de consolider leur petit commerce, les membres du groupe ont décidé de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 1er  cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Fatoumata (2ème femme debout de la  gauche vers la droite sur la photo) est une grande vendeuse d’habits de toutes sortes et elle  s’approvisionnant chez son fournisseur à Bamako. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter une balle de friperie (habits). La revente se fait au comptant et à crédit dans la ville de Ségou sur place  et en ambulant à une clientèle composée d’hommes et  de femmes. Madame Fatoumata  compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 25 000 FCFA, qui sera investi dans l’activité et assurer l’entretien des enfants.
texts.en:
The group Lafia comprises seven women who are married for the most part and monogamous. The women average 34 years of age and three children each. They all live in Segou City (4th administrative region of the Republic of Mali) and know one another through ties of community, kinship, and their revenue-generating businesses. They have small-scale businesses involving clothing, secondhand clothing, fish, and peanuts. 

With the goal of consolidating their small businesses, the group members decided to collaborate with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their first solidarity loan cycle. 

Ms. Fatoumata (second women standing from the left in the photo) is a major vendor of clothing of all sorts. She gets her supplies from a supplier in Bamako. She intends to use her loan to purchase a bale of secondhand clothing. Sales are made in cash or on credit in Segou City, locally, and by going door to door. Her customer base is composed of men and women. 

Ms. Fatoumata plans on making an average monthly profit of 25,000 francs CFA that will be reinvested in her business and used to ensure her children's care.

loans.use: to purchase secondhand clothing to sell

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr: Madame Adjo a 3 enfants et est âgée de 31 ans. Pour améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille, elle revend dans un marché de la place les oignons, des gingembres et d’autres produits. Elle cumule 09 ans d’expérience et s’approvisionne au grand marché de Lomé en gros et redistribue en détail. Elle demande un quatrième prêt pour acheter des sacs d’oignons. Elle espère agrandir son commerce et assurer un avenir meilleur à sa famille.
texts.en: Ms. Adjo has three children and is 31 years old. To improve her family's living conditions, she sells onions, ginger, and other products at a local market. She has accumulated nine years of experience. She gets her supplies wholesale from the big market in Lomé and redistributes them retail. She is asking for a fourth loan to purchase sacks of onions. She hopes to expand her business and ensure a better future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase onions, ginger, and other products

loans.name: Sylvie

texts.fr: Sylvie est une jeune femme de 37 ans, mère de 03 enfants et vivant dans un quartier de la capitale économique douala. Elle tient un comptoir depuis 04 ans où elle vend divers produits. Grace à son dynamisme dans ce domaine, elle s'est faite une clientèle grandissante qu'elle aimerait continuer de satisfaire. Pour cela elle sollicite un crédit qui lui permettra d'acheter (un sac de riz, un sac d'arachide, un sac de charbon quelque bidons d'huile, les condiments et le sel). Les bénéfices tirés de ce nouveau prêt lui permettront d'investir davantage dans son activité et de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Sylvie is a young woman, 37 years old, and the mother of three children. She lives in a district in Douala, the economic capital city. She has had a stall for four years where she sells a variety of products. Thanks to her dynamism in this domain, she has gotten a growing customer base that she would like to continue to satisfy. To do so, she is requesting a loan enabling her to purchase a sack of rice, a sack of peanuts, a sack of charcoal, a few containers of oil, condiments, and salt. The profits derived from this new loan will enable her to invest more in her business and to support her family.

loans.use: to purchase rice, peanuts, charcoal, oil, condiments, and salt.

loans.name: Solidaridad Andina Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “SOLIDARIDAD ANDINA” iniciará el cuarto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Alto Lima, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Maritza es la Secretaria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: elaboración de cajas para luz, venta de telas, tienda de barrio, venta de cosméticos, venta de chalecos, elaboración y venta de carnes frías.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Maritza es integrante, ella indica que hace año y medio que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es socias de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de comida; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió por hace siete años de forma independiente, ya que anteriormente ayudaba a su madre aprendiendo esta dinámica de negocio.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de arroz, fideo y papa) que adquirirá de las ferias por mayor y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella vive en concubinato.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones del área de salud y crédito.
texts.en:
“Solidaridad Andina” (Andean Solidarity) is a Communal Bank that will start its fourth cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Alto Lima Community Center. It is composed of eight members, guided by a directive board, in which Maritza is the Secretary. The members of the Communal Bank engage in different activities such as creating lightboxes, selling fabric, running a general store, selling cosmetics, selling pullovers, preparing and selling cold meat.

Maritza is one of the micro entrepreneurs forming this group, and she will benefit from the requested loan. She says she has been a member of Pro Mujer for one year and a half, having been invited by a friend who is a member of the institution. She is currently running a food stall, and she say she started this activity seven years ago out of her own intuitive; previously she used to help her mother and form her she learned how to run this activity.

The loan she in currently requesting will be used to increase her working capital by buying rice, noodles and potatoes at wholesale price; she will buy them in the fairs to then prepare and sell them in her stall. This type of activity helps her earning an income to economically support her household as much as she can, as she is single and she has she lives in in a common-law relationship.

When asked about what she likes of Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the health and loan seminars.

loans.use: To buy rice, noodles and potatoes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To fruit juices, sweets, sugar, beans, rice, salt, soaps and Pampers nappies.

loans.name: Husein

texts.en:
Husein is a 24-year-old married man and the father of one child. Five years ago, he opened a call center, which is a necessary service to provide in his region. To improve his living conditions and increase his income, Husein started selling mobile-phone accessories and souvenirs, which was a good step forward.

Husein is applying for a Youth loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua in order to improve his accessories selling sector with a newly released collection attractive to customers.

He puts so much effort in providing his family with the best living. He is working hard to make sure that his child will have the best education, which Husein didn't have the chance to finish.

He hopes to keep on developing his business and replying to both his family's and customers' needs.

loans.use: to improve his accessories selling sector with a newly released collection of mobile-phone accessories.

loans.name: Serah

texts.en:
Serah, aged 43 years, is a married woman and has five children who all attend school. Her husband is a businessman, and together they own a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

Serah has operated a shop kiosk business for the past five years. Her potential clients are neighbors and passersby. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future. 

With the Kshs (KES) 20,000, she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, beans, and sugar. She decided to join Yehu to access financial support to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, beans, and sugar.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jose tiene 35 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo es la cuna de grandes glorias del deporte peruano y también sus pobladores son conocidos por tener un don maravilloso para la preparación de platillos.  Jose es un joven muy  trabajador, pero cuando tiene un tiempito libre le gusta mucho ver películas pero sobre todo al lado de su famila ya que el es casado y junto a  su esposo tiene 2 hijos maravillosos a los cuales ama muchísimo y por quienes trabaja muy duro para poder darle una vida digna y sobre todo mucho amor. 

Por ello día a día Jose trabaja como obrero en un fundo agrícola, el labora alrededor de 8 horas al día, con el fruto de su trabajo puede apoyar a su esposa con los gastos de su hogar; el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Jose está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar materiales para colocar piso en su vivienda, así como también poder tarrajear las paredes, de esta manera podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y seguirá trabajando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hijo y poder terminar de construir su casa”.
texts.en:
Jorge is 35 years old and lives in the city of Chincha, which is known for its warm and comfortable climate and as the birthplace of famous Peruvian sports players. Its inhabitants are also known for being excellent cooks.

Jorge is very hardworking, but when he has a free moment he likes to watch films, but above all to be with his family. He is married, and he and his wife have two wonderful children that they love very much. Jorge works very hard to give his children a good life and much love. For this reason he works each day as a laborer for an agricultural holding. He works around eight hours each day, and with his earnings he is able to support his wife and pay their household expenses. He believes that he is doing well at work because he is responsible and because he very much wants to get ahead.

Jorge is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to their help he will be able to buy materials to install a floor in his home and to plaster the walls with cement. With this loan he will be able to improve his family’s quality of life and continue working for his greatest dream, which is to give his son a good education and to finish the construction of his family’s home.

loans.use: to buy materials to install a floor in his home and to plaster the walls with cement.

loans.name: Mujeres En Accion Group

texts.es:
Mujeres en Accion gracias a su esfuerzo y trabajo en conjunto ya está en su ciclo numero 16. Ellas son mujeres muy organizadas, que se ayudan las unas a las otras para poder ir creciendo y también dar a sus familias todo lo que necesitan. Ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza para conocer la situación de cada una de ellas.
Patrocinia es una de las miembros, ella se dedica a la venta de lencería, se esfuerza al máximo día a día para poder mejorar su economía y de esa forma también poder dar a su familia lo que necesitan. Ella comenta que su mayor fortaleza es su familia, ya que lucha por ellos, y quiere darles lo mejor.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de lencerías para la venta, de esa forma podrá mejorar sus productos y dar a su familia lo que necesitan. Y seguir creciendo en su economía.
texts.en:
Thanks to the effort and mutual work of its members, the group “Mujeres en Accion” (Women in Action) is in its 16th loan cycle. These women are very organized and they help one another grow. They also want to provide everything their families need. The women are taking a poverty elimination survey so that each of them can become familiar with their situations.

Patrocinia is one of the members. She sells lingerie and gives her best effort day after day to improve her finances so that she can provide what her family needs. Patrocinia says that her greatest strength is her family, so she strives to provide them the best. She is requesting a loan in order to buy lingerie to sell so that she can improve her inventory of products and provide her family with what they need. Patrocinia will also be able to continue growing her finances.

loans.use: to buy lingerie to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase one box of premium plates and a dozen plastic plates.

loans.name: Flor De Cielo Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “FLOR DE CIELO”  iniciará el cuarto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Senkata, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Luiza es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de fruta y verduras, venta de ropa, tienda de comida, venta de zapatos, venta de papa.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Luiza es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de fruta; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió por concejos de sus padres, que realizaban el mismo negocio.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de fruta) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es casada y tiene  seis hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta le gusta las capacitaciones en salud y crédito.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “FLOR DE CIELO” (Flower of Heaven) will start its fourth cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Senkata Community Centre. The group is comprised of eight members and it is lead by a Board of Directors where Luiza is the President. The businesses carried out by the members of the Communal Bank vary in the sales of: fruits and vegetables, clothing, shoes and potatoes.

The loan taken will benefit small micro entrepreneurs where Luiza is a member. She points out that she has been a member of Pro Mujer for two years, joining by invitation from a friend who is a member of the institution. At the present time she has a business selling fruits. She undertook this business with her parents' advice, who also have the same business.

The loan that she is now requesting is to increase capital (purchase of fruits) that she will buy from wholesalers in the city of La Paz, and later sell it in her retail space. This type of work allows her to generate income to support her family. Luiza is married and has six children. 

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she said that she likes the health and finance training.

loans.use: to purchase fruits.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.en:
Pablo and his wife, Anna, are certified organic cacao farmers who manage two acres of mature cacao trees in a village called Indian Creek - which is also home to an beautiful Mayan ruin called “NimliPunit”. Together, they have raised ten children, one of whom still lives at home. Selling cacao provides income that helps Pablo and Anna send their children to school.

Pablo started his farm by direct cacao seed planting and is happy that he can sell freshly harvested cacao beans to Maya Mountain Cacao.

This loan will allow Pablo to hire men to help clear brush from an area on his farm, so that he can transplant ready seedlings. Pablo’s plan is to expand his cacao farm within the next couple of years and, eventually, transfer it to his children.

loans.use: To prune and transplant cacao trees

loans.name: Toribio

texts.en:
Toribio is 67 and lives with his wife, Mercedes, in the beautiful village of San Felipe in southern Belize. He started planting cacao with assistance from the local Ministry of Agriculture and now manages 6 acres with many mature cacao trees.

Toribio also runs a small grocery store and a private passenger bus that takes villagers to a nearby town. Mercedes particularly enjoys taking care of the farm and harvesting the cacao beans. Only a few miles from Maya Mountain Cacao, they are happy that they can sell their cocao on a larger scale.

With this loan, Toribio plans to hire people to help clean his six acres of land. As he continues to grow the farm, he hopes that his children will adopt farming and one day transfer the land to them.

loans.use: To clean land in preparation to plant cacao trees

loans.name: Edgar

texts.en:
Edgar is a 26 year old cacao farmer in the beautiful village of Santa Elena in the southern-most part of Belize.  The village of Santa Elena is situated along a newly constructed highway connecting Belize to Guatemala.

Inspired by the advice of a neighbor, Edgar and his wife, Miriam, manage 2 acres with around 500 mature cacao trees. Miriam enjoys harvesting the ripe cacao pods and selling them to Maya Mountain Cacao. In addition to the cacao, they also cultivate beans and Pepitoria seeds on their land.

With this loan, Edgar will hire people to help him properly clean and prune his farm in preparation for harvesting season. Edgar plans to expand his farm and plant more cacao plants, which he hopes will allow him to quit working on the side and focus on the farm.

The cacao income allows Edgar and Miriam to meet financial needs at home and save money to help them start a family.

loans.use: To clean and prune cacao trees

loans.name: Emerterio

texts.en:
Emiterio is a 56 year old certified organic cacao farmer. He lives in the beautiful village of San Jose with his wife, Matilda, and their six children, four of whom still live at home and are in school. Emeterio is an Extension Officer at Maya Mountain Cacao, where he spends most of his time networking with farmers and assisting them.

Coming from a family of farmers, Emiterio has seen that there is a high demand for cacao domestically and internationally. Cacao is a source of income for Emiterio and it helps him meet his financial obligations.  Emiterio and his wife, Anna, enjoy the harvesting process.

Emiterio is requesting this loan to hire people to help clean brush from an area to transplant cacao seedlings. Emiterio's days are limited on his farm due to his demanding MMC work in the field. This loan will really help him prepare his land for transplanting. 

He plans to retire to his farm, which will be able to assist him financially to cover his daily expense for him and his wife. He hopes that his children find employment, but take over the farm later on.

loans.use: To clear land for new cacao seedlings

loans.name: Cirilo

texts.en:
Cirilo, age 76, is a certified organic cacao farmer in the beautiful village of San Jose. The village is located in one of the remotest parts of southern Belize. Cirilo and his wife, Polonia, have ten children.  

Cirilo was inspired to start planting cacao from the advice of his first son. His son used to work with a local association which purchased cacao beans and secured a market for the farmers. Cirilo manages 1000 mature cacao trees and the additional income has shown financial improvement in his life.  Cirilo continues to expand his cacao farm however he faces major challenges such as pests, Monilla disease, block pods and birds. Cirilo stated that due to the Monilla disease production yields have decreased.

Cirilo is requesting this loan to hire people to help clean and prune his farm, which will decrease the spread of diseases and increase cacao yields. His children are employed elsewhere, but he hopes that one of his children will take over the cacao farm someday.

loans.use: To clean and prune 1000 cacao trees

loans.name: Lucas

texts.en:
Lucas, age 71, is a farmer in the beautiful village of San Jose. Lucas and his wife, Juanita, raised five children. Two of his children are living at home and three living on their own. Lucas manages two acres of 500 mature and 200 young cacao trees.

Lucas was inspired to plant cacao trees from a local cacao buyer who informed farmers about how to grow cacao and issued seedlings to interested farmers. Selling cacao beans assists him to meet his daily financial needs. Lucas and Juanita enjoy the cleaning and harvesting of cacao from their farm. Fermentation of the cacao bean has been challenging for them, but with Maya Mountain Cacao buying freshly harvested cacao beans he is more relaxed.

Lucas is requesting this loan to hire people to help him properly clean his farm for the next season. As three of his children are grown up and the other two are in secondary school, it is not possible for them to help him to clean his land.

Lucas enjoys all the benefits of cacao farming. His future plans are to live happily with his wife and for his farm to be managed by his children when they are able to do so.

loans.use: To clean and prune cacao trees

loans.name: Sartana

texts.en:
Sartana, age 33, is a certified organic cacao farmer living in the beautiful village of San Pedro Columbia. Sartana and her husband, Cirilo, have four children. 

Sartana and Cirilo were inspired to plant cacao trees as Sartana grew up planting cacao. She stated that cacao is an income crop and she wishes to have more. Sartana finds that young cacao trees are hard to manage because they require more attention and cleaning. Presently, she has 200 cacao seedlings that she urgently needs to clean. Cirilo has a job which leaves little time to properly manage the farm. 

Sartana is requesting this loan to hire people to help her clean and prune her trees. This will allow her to spend more time with their children at home. Her future goals are to expand her farm by planting more cacao trees. With more income Sartana wants to assist her children to further their education in order to better equip them with the skills to professionally manage the family’s cacao farm.

loans.use: To clean and prune cacao trees

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is an inspiring entrepreneur with big dreams. Orphaned at a young age, Josephine has had to work many odd jobs throughout her life to help bring in some extra income for her family. After the death of her husband, she created three businesses of her own.  She is now a clothing distributor, a hairdresser and a retailer of energy-efficient cook stoves.

As a single mother working three jobs, Josephine has little time to spend with her children, and access to capital or even disposable income is difficult. Josephine hopes that, with the help of a loan from Kiva, she will be able to afford to maintain a healthy inventory of clean cook stoves to sell door-to-door. 

With the extra income, she plans to move her businesses out of her home and create her own shop and distribution point.

loans.use: to maintain a healthy inventory of cook stoves and move her business out of her home.

loans.name: Zapatito Veloz-10 Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ZAPATITO VELOZ-10” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de German Busch, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Miriam es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: hilado de lana de alpaca, venta de repuestos, venta de medias, venta de comida, ayudante de construcción, comerciante de chatarras, tienda de barrio, tejido de chompas, venta de ropa de mujer.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Miriam es integrante, ella indica que hace nueve años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de su cuñada que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de repuestos de autos; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió por iniciativa propia hace varios años.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de radiadores) que adquirirá de las tiendas distribuidoras de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud y las capacitaciones.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Zapatito Velos-10” is starting its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the German Busch Community Center. This group consists of eight members and is led by a Board of Directors headed by Sra. Miriam as its president. The members of this Communal Bank engage in different businesses such as spinning thread from alpaca wool, selling spare parts, selling stockings, selling food, working as a construction assistant, working as a scrap metal merchant, managing a neighborhood store, making woven sweaters, and selling women’s clothing.

This loan will benefit small businesswomen such as Sra. Miriam. She says that she joined Pro Mujer nine years ago after receiving an invitation from her sister-in-law, who is also a member of the organization. Miriam currently has a business of selling automobile parts. She took the initiative to learn this trade and has been in business for several years.

The loan she is receiving now will increase her capital for buying radiators, which she will acquire from the distribution shops in the city of El Alto. She will sell them later from her retail space. Working in this manner enables her to generate income to support her household. Miriam is married and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Miriam said that she enjoys the health services and the training sessions.

loans.use: to buy radiators.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Yolanda De Jesus

texts.es:
Yolanda, requiere optar por un nuevo préstamo por la necesidad de capital de trabajo para seguir invirtiendo en el negocio; este le permitirá comprar telas, adornos, hilo, agujas y otros accesorios de sastrería.
El crédito anterior le ayudo  a generar ganancias y esta las utilizo para los gastos del hogar; las condiciones económicas y las circunstancias familiares han mejorado, ya que sus hijos siguen estudiando.
texts.en:
Yolanda has chosen to request a new loan because she needs operating capital to continue investing in her business. This will enable her to buy fabrics, decorative accessories, thread, needles, and other tailoring supplies.

The previous loan helped her to generate income, which she used for the household expenses. Her financial condition and her family circumstances have improved. Her children are also able to continue their studies.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, decorative accessories, thread, needles, and other tailoring supplies.

loans.name: Las Triunfadoras Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS TRIUNFADORAS”  iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Patacamaya, está compuesta por diez integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Rufina es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de leche, venta de verdura, papa, chuño y tunta (papa deshidratada), venta de queso, producción de papa, confección de ropa deportiva.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Rufina es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de un promotor de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de producción de leche; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de sus padres y posteriormente decide emprenderlo independientemente.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el alimento de ganado (compra de forraje y cebada) que adquirirá de las ferias aledañas a su comunidad y posteriormente alimentará a sus animales en el tiempo de sequía. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella vive en unión libre y tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones y los créditos.
texts.en:
The “LAS TRIUNFADORAS”  Communal Bank is starting its first cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Patacamaya Regional Office. There are ten members and the group is governed by a board of directors. Rufina is the group president.
The members' businesses are varied and include: milk sales; vegetable, potato, potato starch, and tunta (dehydrated potato) sales; cheese sales; potato production; and making sports clothing.
This loan will help these small businesses, one of which is Rufina's. Rufina tells us that this is her first time with Pro Mujer. She joined at the invitation of a promoter who came to visit her at home. She currently has a milk production business. She tells us that she learned this business from her parents and later decided to do it independently.
This loan is for feeding her livestock (to buy fodder and barley). She will buy the feed in the markets surrounding her community and later feed it to her animals during the drought. This work allows her to generate an income to support her household where possible. She has a partner and three children.
When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replied that she likes the training and the loans.

loans.use: to buy fodder and barley.

loans.name: Rene Arcides

texts.es:
René, se dedica a la ganadería, asimismo al cultivo de maíz y frijol. El vive con su familia y tiene tres hijos, los cuales tienen edades de 9, 17 y 21 años de edad; el oficio lo realiza desde hace 15 años y actividad que la aprendió de sus padres, hasta el momento no tiene  ningún problema.
El crédito que solicita le permitirá comprar abono, herbicidas, insecticidas, plaguicidas y pago de arrendamiento de tierra para llevar a cabo el cultivo; este le ayudara a comprar los insumos agrícolas y con las ganancias aportar para su familia.
Su sueño es crecer en el negocio y apoyar a sus hijos para que se preparen académicamente.
texts.en:
René is a cattle farmer as well as engaging in planting corn and beans. He lives with his family and he has three children aged 9, 17 and 21. He has been engaging in this activity for 15 years, he has learned it form his parents and up to know he has had no problems.
The loan he is requesting will allow him to buy manure, weed-killers, insecticides, pest-control substances, and to pay the rent of his land in order to harvest his crops. This will help him to buy farming supplies and he will succeed in providing for his family with his income.
He dreams of seeing his activity grow and to support his children in their studies.

loans.use: To buy manure, weed-killers, insecticides, pest-control substances, and to pay the rent of his land.

loans.name: Roberto William

texts.es:
Roberto, se dedica al cultivo de maíz, pipián, plátanos, entre otros. El está soltero y vive con sus padres, no tiene familiares en el extranjero; el oficio lo aprendió con sus padres y hoy en día lo realiza independientemente y lo lleva a cabo desde hace dos años.
El préstamo que requiere le permitirá comprar los insumos agrícolas necesarios para llevar a cabo el cultivo,  tales como: abono, herbicidas, insecticidas, plaguicidas, pesticidas; este le ayudara a tener listo el terreno para la siembra.
Su sueño es agregar otro tipo de cultivo, mejorar sus ingresos, construir su propia vivienda y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia
texts.en:
Roberto engages in planting corn, pipiánes*, plantains and other products. He is single and he lives with his parents, and he has no relatives abroad. He learned his activity from his parents; nowadays he works independently and has been engages in it for two years.
The loan he is requesting will allow him to buy farming supplies he needs to harvest his crops, and he will buy manure, weed-killers, insecticides, pest-control substances and pesticides. This will help him having the land ready to be sowed.
He dreams of adding other types of crops, of improving his income, of building his own house and of granting a better standard of living to his family.

<cite>Pipián is a variety of squash known as ‘cushaw’ in the United States</cite>

loans.use: To buy manure, weed-killers, insecticides, pest-control substances and pesticides.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie has earned a living through her seaweed farming business for more than two years now. She is a married woman and lives with her family in Bien Unido, Bohol. 

Rosalie is asking for a loan to buy more seaweed seedlings and straw. Through this, she will be able to improve her business as well as her income. 

Rosalie dreams of a sustainable livelihood, and she believes that, through this loan, she will be able to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more seaweed seedlings and straw.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
This is Fatuma. Her previous loan was a big help in her business. She was able to repair her motorcycle. She has been in this business for years now, and it keeps on growing. 

She would like to apply for another loan, this time for 30,000 Kenyan shillings to buy spare parts for her motorcycle to continue with operations. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for her motorcycle.

loans.name: Riziki

texts.en:
For years, Riziki has operated a retail shop, selling from home to restaurant operators and neighbors.  She dreams of expanding to a grocery shop alongside her retail shop in the future. 

With the 40,000 Kenyan shillings, she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, rice, sugar, cereals and tea leaves for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, rice, sugar, cereals and tea leaves for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a water tank so she can store clean water for use.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is a married woman and a mother of four children from San Miguel, Bohol. She is engaged in the retail sale of farm crops like bananas, cassava, sweet potatoes and others.

Susana is asking for a loan to buy more farm crops like bananas, cassava, sweet potatoes and others. Through this, she will be able to sell more to the market and augment her sales and income. In the future, Susana dreams of expanding her business and making it a success.

loans.use: to buy more farm crops like bananas, cassava, sweet potatoes and others.

loans.name: Saumu

texts.en:
Saumu, aged 40 years, is married and has six children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees for the family.

For the past ten years, Saumu has operated a coconuts-selling business. She sells to her neighbors and passersby. Her major challenge is seasonality, especially during the dry season, when coconuts are not available in large quantity.  

With the Kshs (KES) 15,000, she wants to purchase sacks of coconuts for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business and improve her living standards.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of coconuts for resale.

loans.name: Ricardo Antonio

texts.es: Don Ricardo de 41 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa y su hijo de 12 años de edad. Él se dedica al cultivo de maiz y maicillo desde hace varios  años. De esta forma es como se gana la vida y puede llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. La actividad del cultivo la realiza año con año, y es la única forma que conoce de como ganarse la vida. Es un hombre muy trabajador, honrado y responsable. Don Ricardo ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito para comprar los principales insumos agrícolas: abonos, venenos para plagas, semillas, etc. y mejorar el terreno donde siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía. Espera tener resultados favorables ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Confía en Dios que logrará obtener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
Ricardo, age 41, lives in his own house with his wife and his 12 year old son.  He has been growing corn and sorghum for several years.  This is the way he earns a living and is able to bring home the daily bread.

He farms year after year, and it is the only way he knows to earn a living.  He is a very hard-working, honest, and responsible man.

Ricardo has made the decision to request a loan to buy the main agricultural supplies:  fertilizers, pesticides, and seeds, etc. and to improve his land where he plants, which is shown in the photograph.

He hopes to have favorable results because he does not have another source of income.  He trusts in God that he will manage to get an abundant harvest, which will allow him to continue bringing home the daily bread.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides, and seeds, etc.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es: Rafael de 61 años de edad vive junto a su esposa y su hijo, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene 10 años de trabajar en la agricultura y ha ganado experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno donde siembra está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a su vivienda, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que lo prefiere porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles, don Rafael quiere hacer una nueva inversión que le permita aumentar la producción por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, abono, insecticida, herramientas, etc.  Don Rafael  tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Rafael, 61, lives with his wife and son; he’s been working in agriculture for ten years growing corn and beans.  He’s gained valuable experience that makes it possible for him to get the best crop yields.  The field he plants on is located in a zone with high incidence of agriculture that’s quite near his house.  He sells in all the community’s surrounding areas and has gained a large clientele that prefers him because everything he sells is top quality at accessible prices.

Rafael would like to make a new investment that will allow him to increase production which is why he’s requesting a loan to buy corn and bean seeds, insecticide, tools, etc.  Rafael has good payment references and is sure that he’ll be able to repay the loan while at the same time hopes to provide economic security for his home.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Luis Agustin

texts.es: Luis de 46 años de edad, se dedica al cultivo de abejas y también al cultivo de maíz  desde hace varios años  lo cual le permite llevar el  pan de cada día a su hogar. Se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, honrado y responsable.  Vive en casa propia con su hija de 14 años de edad ella estudia actualmente, dado que el cultivo es la única forma que conoce para ganarse la vida honradamente ha decidido  solicitar un crédito  ya que necesita invertir en la compra de quintales de azúcar pues es utilizada para la alimentación de las abejas y asi pueda seguir con su trabajo. Confía en Dios y en su trabajo que de esta forma logrará  obtener mejores ganancias  la cual le permitirá accesar a una mejor calidad de vida para él y su hija.
texts.en:
Luis, 46, has worked raising bees and also growing corn for several years which is how he’s able to provide daily bread for his home.  He’s noted for being a very hardworking, honest, responsible man.  He lives in his own house with his 14-year-old daughter who attends school at present.  

Given that agriculture is the only way he knows to earn an honorable living, he’s decided to request a loan because he needs to buy quintals of sugar that’s used as feed for the bees so he can continue with his work.  He trusts in God and in his work that this way he’ll obtain the best profits so he can access a better quality of life for him and for his daughter.

loans.use: to buy sugar to feed is bees.

loans.name: Marta Serafina

texts.es: Marta de 31 años de edad, habita en su vivienda junto a sus 4 hijos y su esposo. Ella se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de maíz y maní (cacahuate). Se ha dedicado a esta actividad durante 10 años de su vida y es así como se gana el pan de cada día. Ella es una mujer  trabajadora, responsable. Debido a que ya es temporada de siembra tomo la decisión de comenzar a prepararse. Es por esa razón que ha decidido solicitar un crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. Lo que más desea es que su cosecha sea abundante y mejor que las anteriores,  ya que esta es la forma en que ella consigue el sustento para su familia.  Confía en Dios que con su ayuda, su dedicación y empeño en el  trabajo lograra el sueño de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Marta, 31, lives in her house with her four children and her husband.  She works in agriculture growing corn and peanuts.  She’s spent ten years of her life in this occupation and this is how she earns her daily bread.  She’s a hardworking, responsible woman.  

Because planting season has arrived, she’s decided to start getting ready and this is the reason she’s asked Integral for a loan to buy seeds, manure, insecticide, etc.  What she wants most is that her harvest is abundant and better than the previous ones because this is how she earns sustenance for her family.  She trusts in God that with your help, her dedication and devotion to work she’ll reach the dream of improving her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, insecticide, etc.

loans.name: Baidy

texts.fr: Monsieur Baidy est Tailleur de fonction  depuis 10 ans. Mais il évolue dans le transport de Taxi. Il vient solliciter un crédit de 350000F CFA pour pouvoir acheter un moteur et réfectionner son véhicule qu'il l'a confié à son frère. Il est marié et père de famille. Il gère les besoins quotidiens de sa famille. Grace au crédit et aux bénéfices réalisés, il peut désormais mettre de l’argent de coté et améliorer les conditions alimentaires de sa famille. Baidy travaille pour à l'avenir augmenter son parc automobile et devenir un grand transporteur.
texts.en: Mr. Baidy  has been a tailor for 10 years but he is becoming a taxi driver.  He is asking for this loan of 350000FCFA in order to buy a motor and repair his car that he entrusted to his brother.  Baidy is married and father of a family.  He takes care of his family's daily needs.  Thanks to this loan and profits earned, he can now set aside money and improve the nutrition of his family.  Baidy works to increase his fleet of cars and become a major carrier in the future.

loans.use: to repair his taxi.

loans.name: Fatou

texts.fr: Madame Fatou est une coiffeuse de profession. Elle a ouvert le salon il plus de 2 ans.Elle a déjà bénéficié de plusieurs crédits qu'elle a remboursé sans problème.Elle fait des tresses, pédicures, manicure, pose greffage etc...Avec ce prêt elle veut diversifier son activité pour charger son salon de produits cosmétiques qu'elle revend à ses clients.
texts.en: Ms. Fatou is a professional hairdresser.  She opened her salon over two years ago. She has already received several loans that she has repaid without difficulty.  She does braids, pedicures, manicures, hair extensions, etc.  With this loan she wants to diversify her business by stocking her salon with cosmetic products that she will sell to her customers.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to resell at her hair salon.

loans.name: Marie Françoise

texts.fr: Madame Françoise est une surveillante pénitentiare de profession depuis 8 ans.Elle est mariée et mère de famille. Sa principale charge est sa petite famille. Elle a besoin de ce prêt pour commencer la construction de sa maison. Elle commence sa journée de travaille à 7h pour la terminer à 19h. A l'avenir elle souhaite finir la construction de sa maison avec l'aide d'autres financements de l'imcec.
texts.en: Mrs Françoise has been a prison warden for eight years. She is married with children. Her principal responsibility is her family. She needs this loan to start building her house. She starts her working day at 0700 and finishes at 1900. In the future she would like to finish building her house with the help of other loans from Uimcec.

loans.use: To start building her house.

loans.name: Babacar

texts.fr:
Monsieur Babacar, âgé de 56 ans, marié et père de 4 enfants évolue dans le secteur de l’agriculture depuis un bon bout de temps. Il vient solliciter un crédit de 200000F CFA afin de préparer l’hivernage en achetant des semences.
Babacar, avec les bénéfices de son activité, s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne de sa famille et de leurs besoins.
Il rêve un jour s’il voit son fond augmenter, d’exploiter d’autres périmètres culturaux pour pouvoir maximiser son profit et améliorer les conditions de vie de son foyer.
texts.en:
Mr. Babacar, age 56, is the married father of four children. He has been a farmer for quite some time. He is seeking a loan of 200,000F CFA to buy seeds in preparation for the rainy season.

With the profits earned through this activity, Babacar takes care of his family’s needs and the day-to-day expenses of the household. 

His long-term goal is to bolster his working capital and expand his farmable area to maximize his profits and improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seeds for his farming activity.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy various merchandise for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy mobile phone recharge cards for resale.

loans.name: Waly

texts.fr:
Monsieur Waly, âgé de 28 ans, marié et père d’un enfant ; s’active dans la vente de sel iodé depuis maintenant 3 ans de cela. Il vient pour la deuxième fois solliciter un crédit de 400000F CFA afin d’acheter des sacs de sel et de les stocker et ne pas être en rupture à la demande des fidèles clients. Avec les bénéfices de son activité, Waly peut s’occuper des besoins de son foyer.
Il rêve de devenir un grand fournisseur de sel dans la région.
texts.en:
Mr Waly, who is 28 and married with one child has been working in the commerce of iodised salt for three years now. This is the second time that he has made a request for a loan of 400000F CFA in order to buy sacks of salt for his stock to avoid being out of merchandise as his faithful customers have requested. The profits from his business enable Waly to provide for his household.

His dream is to become a major salt supplier in his region.

loans.use: to buy iodised salt for resale.

loans.name: Abdoulaye

texts.fr:
Abdoulaye est un jeune célibataire de 26 ans qui évolue dans la vente de crédit Tigo. Il a acquis une expérience de plus de 2 ans dans ce domaine d’activité. Son activité consiste à vendre soit des cartes de crédit, soit du » Izi » comme on appelle couramment la vente de crédit en détail.
Il participe à la dépense quotidienne de la famille car le bénéfice n’est pas aussi régulier que ça. 
S’il a les moyens, il aimerait y associer  une autre activité qui générerait plus de bénéfices.
texts.en:
Abdoulaye, age 26, is a young single man who sells Tigo phone credits. He has over 2 years of experience in this activity, which consists in selling mobile phone recharge cards, or “Izi” as they typically call the retail sale of phone credits.

His profits tend to vary, but he helps with the family’s day to day expenses. 

His goal, when he can afford it, would be to bring in another activity to bolster his overall profit.

loans.use: to buy mobile phone recharge cards for resale.

loans.name: Magatte

texts.fr: Madame Magatte, une dame de 43 ans, mariés sans enfant, évolue dans le secteur du commerce. Elle vient solliciter pour une seconde fois un crédit de 150000F CFA pour acheter divers produits. Magatte vend tous produits qui sont susceptibles de générer un profit à la vente. Dès fois elle reçoit des commandes qu’elle doit honorer pour ne pas perdre sa clientèle elle exécute. C’est pourquoi elle ne se spécialise pas dans un domaine précis. Elle gère ses propres besoins et réinvesti dans l’activité.
texts.en: Ms. Magatte, a 43-year-old married woman with no children, works in the commercial sector. She is seeking a second loan of 150,000 FCFA to buy various items. Magatte sells all types of products that can generate a profit. From time to time she receives orders that she has to fulfill in order to avoid losing her clientele. This is why she does not specialize in a specific type of product. She provides for herself and would like to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To buy various items for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy various items for resale.

loans.name: Astou

texts.fr:
Notre emprunteur s’appelle Astou, elle est âgée de 57 ans, a 7 enfants et évolue dans le secteur du commerce. Elle a acquis une expérience de plus de 10 ans dans ce domaine. Elle a démarré avec ses moyens personnels jusqu’à découvrir l’IMCEC ou elle a pris 2 crédits payé sans problème.
Son commerce consiste à acheter des draps de lit, des pagnes et à le revendre dans le voisinage. Elle a une clientèle régulière dans le quartier ou elle loge. Elle aide son époux dans la gestion des charges familiales.
texts.en:
Our borrower, named Astou, is 57 years old with seven children and is active in the commercial sector. She has gained more than ten years of experience in this field. She began her business with her own funds until she discovered IMCEC, with whom she has obtained and repaid two loans without problems.
Her business consists of buying bedsheets and pagnes (brightly-printed West African clothing) and re-selling them in her neighbourhood. She has a regular clientele in the area where she lives. She helps her husband in managing her family's finances.

loans.use: To obtain bedsheets and pagnes for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy dyeing materials, to dye clothing, and to resell clothes.

loans.name: Maimouna

texts.fr:
Madame Maimouna, âgée de 43 ans est mariée et mère de 4 enfants. Elle vient tout juste de connaitre l’IMCEC et vient solliciter un crédit de 200000F CFA pour améliorer son activité qui consiste à vendre du poisson fumé depuis plus de 5 ans. Elle possède une table devant chez elle et l’entourage connait ce qu’elle vend.

Elle rêve de voir son capital augmenter afin de pouvoir acheter de grandes quantités de poisson fumés, stocker pour pouvoir revendre à un prix plus élevé à la période de pénurie.
texts.en:
Mrs Maimouna is 43 and married with four children. She has just heard about IMCEC and requests a loan of 200000F CFA to improve the smoked fish business that she has been running for over five years. She works from a table outside her home and her friends and family know her products.
She dreams of increasing her capital in order to be able to buy larger quantities of smoked fish to stock up with so that she can then sell at a higher price during periods  of shortage.

loans.use: to buy smoked fish for resale.

loans.name: Marième

texts.fr: Madame Marième âgée de 40 ans, est mariée et mère de 2 enfants. Elle s’active dans l’aviculture .Elle a une expérience de plus de 3 ans dans ce domaine. Elle vient solliciter un crédit de 250000F CFA pour acheter 100 poussins et de l’aliment. Avec les bénéfices collectés, elle peut augmenter le nombre de sujets et au finish maximiser son profit afin de pouvoir appuyer son mari dans la dépense quotidienne. Elle possède un poulailler moyen, elle aimerait l’agrandir et devenir un fournisseur à plein temps.
texts.en: Ms. Marième is 40 years old, married, and has two children. She is active in poultry farming. She has gained more than three years of experience in this field. She is seeking a loan of 250,000 FCFA to buy 100 chicks and chicken feed. With the income earned, she will be able to increase her volume and in the end maximize her profit, thus being able to support her husband in meeting the household's daily expenses. She has an average sized henhouse, and would like to enlarge it and become a full-time supplier.

loans.use: To buy chicks to raise and resell.

loans.name: Amy

texts.fr: Amy une jeune célibataire de 25 ans s’active dans le commerce depuis 2 ans. Elle vend de l’huile de palme et acquis a une expérience de plus 2 ans dans ce domaine. Amy vient solliciter pour la deuxième fois un crédit de 100000F CFA pour acheter 5 barils d’huile de palme venant du sud du Sénégal qui est la meilleure qualité préférée. Elle réussi à régler ses propres besoins avec les bénéfices tirés de l’activité. Elle aimerait augmenter la quantité de marchandises surtout pour préparer l’hivernage qui arrive.
texts.en: Amy is a young spinster of 25 who has been in business for two years. She sells palm oil and has two years of experience in this field. Amy requests a second loan of 100000F CFA to buy five barrels of palm oil from South Senegal that is the best quality and most in demand. She manages to provide for herself with the proceeds from this business. She would like to increase the quantity of her merchandise in order to prepare for the winter that is approaching.

loans.use: to buy palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy various products to sell

loans.name: Amadou

texts.fr:
Monsieur Amadou est un jeune de 38 ans, célibataire sans enfant. Il vient de faire la connaissance de l’IMCEC et sollicite pour la 1ère fois un crédit de 100000F CFA afin d’améliorer son activité qui consiste à vendre des cartes de recharges crédit telles qu’il en existe dans le pays : Orange, Expresso, Tigo. Amadou a acquis une expérience de plus de 5 ans dans ce domaine et a démarré avec un maigre capital sans l’appui de financement quelconque.  Malgré des bénéfices minimes, il arrive à gérer ses propres besoins.
Il rêve d’avoir un fond beaucoup plus consistant et de hisser son activité à un niveau élevé.
texts.en:
Mr. Amadou, age 38, is a young single man without children. Recently introduced to IMCEC, he is seeking a loan of 100,000F CFA to bolster his activity. Amadou sells mobile phone recharge cards from Orange, Expresso and Tigo, which are widely-used in his country. 

Amadou has over five years of experience in this business, which he initially started with modest funds and no financial support whatsoever. 

He manages to support himself despite minimal profits. 

His goal is to strengthen his working capital and bolster his activity.

loans.use: to buy mobile phone recharge cards (Orange,Expresso, Tigo) for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy grains and nuts: millet, corn, ground nuts to resell

loans.name: Oumar

texts.fr:
Monsieur Oumar, 46 ans, marié et père de 3 enfants est un agriculteur. Métier qu’il a hérité de son père. A fin de mieux préparer l’hivernage qui pointe du bout du nez, Oumar demande un crédit de 300000F CFA  pour l’achat de semences et d’engrais pour exploiter son champ. Avec les revenus de son activité, il entretient sa famille et améliore son activité.
S’il a les moyens, il aimerait exploiter d’autres terres pour diversifier ses cultures.
texts.en: Mr. Oumar, 46 year old, married and the father of three, is a farmer. He has inherited this trade from his father. In order to better prepare for the approaching rainy season, Oumar is asking for a loan of 300,000 West African francs to buy seeds and fertilizers for his field. His revenues are used to support his family and improve his business. If he had the funds, he would like to work additional fields in order to diversify his crops.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for his field.

loans.name: Alassane

texts.fr:
Monsieur Alassane est un jeune de 27 ans, marié, un enfant.  Il loge aux environs du guichet et vient de connaitre l’IMCEC qui pourra l’appuyer pour qu’il puisse acquérir une moto djakarta pour faire du transport. Il aura besoin de 300000F CFA pour cette opération.
 Il s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne de son foyer. Alassane, puisse qu’il est jeune, désire avoir une autre activité parallèle qui pourra lui rapporter beaucoup plus d’argent afin de mettre sa famille à l’abri du besoin.
texts.en:
Mr. Alassane is a young 27-year-old man, married with one child. He lives near the branch office and recently came to know IMCEC that can help him acquire a Djakarta motorcycle for transportation. He will need 300,000 FCFA for this undertaking.

Alassane takes care of daily household expenses. Since he is young, he wants another parallel activity to earn much more money and meet his family's needs.

loans.use: buy a Djakarta motorcycle for transportation

loans.name: Ibrahima

texts.fr:
Monsieur Ibrahima âgé de 33 ans, marié et père de 3 enfants, fait du transport. Il vient solliciter un crédit de 300000F CFA pour l’achat d’une moto djakarta dans le but de faire du transport. Il vit avec ses parents et participe à la dépense quotidienne. 
S’il avait les moyens, il aimerait acquérir un véhicule pour diversifier son transport et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en: Monsieur Ibrahima, 33 years old, married and father of three children, works in transportation. He just requested a loan of 300,000 CFA francs to buy a Djakarta motorbike with the goal of providing transportation services. He lives with his parents and assists with their everyday spending. If he had the means, he would like to purchase a vehicle to diversify his transport services and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a Djakarta motorbike for transportation services

loans.name: Zeynabou

texts.fr:
Notre emprunteur s’appelle Zeynabou, elle est mariée et n’a pas encore d’enfant. Elle sollicite pour la deuxième fois un crédit de 500000F CFA pour acheter divers produits alimentaires comme du pain de singe, du tamarin, de ll'oseille séché mais aussi des balaies, des tissus... Elle n’est pas novice dans le commerce car elle a acquis une expérience de plus de 5 ans dans ce domaine. 
Zeynabou n’a pas de charges car c’est son mari qui la gère. Elle réinvestit son bénéfice dans l’activité et augmente sa capacité d’injonction du capital. Elle peut s’adonner à d’autres activités qui pourraient lui rapporter, c’est d’ailleurs la raison pour laquelle elle est entrée à l’IMCEC pour avoir leur appui financier.
texts.en:
Our borrower is called Zeynabou. She is married and has no children yet. She is requesting for the second time a credit loan of 500,000 FCFA to buy various wholesale merchandise to resell: baobab, tamarind, sorrel, brooms, tissue. She is not new to the business as she has more than five years' experience in this field.

Zeynabou has no financial burdens as her husband manages this area. She reinvests her profits in her business activity and increases her working capital. She can engage in other activities to generate income, which is why she came to IMCEC to seek their financial support.

loans.use: buy various wholesale merchandise to resell: baobab, tamarind, sorrel, tissue

loans.name: Sokhna

texts.fr:
Monsieur Sokhna est un homme de 40 ans, marié et père de 2 enfants. Il est sociétaire à un de nos guichet qui se trouve presque au centre du pays. Il est tailleur de profession et possède une mercerie ou il vend aussi des tissus et de la garniture pour couture. Il a une expérience de plus de 2 ans dans ce métier. Sokhna a déjà eu un crédit à l’IMCEC et veut renouveler d’un montant de 400000F CFA afin d’acheter de la garniture et des tissus qu'il expose ou qu’il coud pour revendre.
 Il gère la dépense quotidienne de son foyer. Et grâce au crédit, il arrive à mettre de l’argent de coté. Il a comme projet futur d’augmenter ses machines à coudre.
texts.en:
Mr. Sokhna is a 40-year-old man, married with two children. He is a member of one of our branch offices located almost in the center of the country.

He is a tailor by profession and owns a haberdashery where he also sells fabrics and trimmings for sewing. He has over 2 years' experience in this business.

Sokhna has already had an IMCEC credit loan and wants to renew it for an amount of 400,000 FCFA, to buy trimmings and fabrics to display or to use in sewing items for sale.

He manages the daily household expenses. Thanks to the loan, he manages to put money aside. His plans for the future are to increase his number of sewing machines.

loans.use: buy fabrics and haberdashery trimmings for his business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy various products for resale.

loans.name: Chérif

texts.fr: Chérif est un jeune de 28 ans, célibataire qui s’active dans la vente de divers produits. C’est un jeune débrouillard qui refuse de tendre la main pour régler ses besoins personnels. Il s’est tourné vers IMCEC afin de pouvoir bénéficier d’un crédit de 100000F CFA pour acheter et revendre des produits divers. Chérif peut vendre tous produits qui sont susceptibles de générer un bénéfice même minime que soit- il. Il rêve de diversifier son activité  s’il voit son capital augmenter.
texts.en:
Chérif is a young 28-year-old bachelor who is active in selling various products. He is a resourceful young man who refuses to put out his hand to resolve his personal needs. 

He turned to IMCEC to request a 100,000 FCFA credit loan, to buy and resell various products. Chérif can sell all products likely to generate even minimal profits.

He dreams to diversify his business activity if he sees an increase of his working capital.

loans.use: purchase various products to resell

loans.name: Mariama

texts.fr:
Madame Mariama, âgée de 31 ans est mariée et mère de 2 enfants. Elle s’active dans la vente de fruits et légumes et de nana (une plante qui entre dans la préparation de jus et du thé noir). Elle a une expérience de 2 ans. Avec le crédit qu’elle sollicite, elle pourra acheter des fruits et légumes et stocker et ce dernier impactera sur sa famille car il pourra à partir des bénéfices, améliorer les conditions alimentaires de sa famille en appuyant son mari dans les charges.
Elle désire dans l’avenir, agrandir son commerce.
texts.en:
Mrs. Mariama is 31 years old, married and has two children. She is active in the sale of fruit and vegetables and nana (a plant used in the preparation of juice and black tea). She has an experience of 2 years.

With the loan she is requesting, she will buy and stock up on fruit and vegetables. This will have an impact on her family as the profits will enable her to improve her family's nutritional requirements by helping her husband deal with expenses.

In the future she wants to expand her business.

loans.use: buy fruit and vegetables and nana (plant) to sell

loans.name: Gie Sope Sa Dieukeur 2 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe de crédit Sope Sa Dieuker dirigée par la dame Néné, regroupe 5 femmes qui logent dans le même quartier. Elles s’activent toute dans le commerce. Néné, elle, vend des produits divers depuis maintenant plus de 2 ans. C’est un nouveau groupe qui vient pour la première fois solliciter un crédit de 500000F CFA pour améliorer son commerce. Elle est mariée et mère de famille. Elle appuie son mari dans les charges de la maison. Elle souhaite diversifier ses activités pour maximiser son profit.
texts.en:
The Sope Sa Dieuker Loan Group - led by lady Nene - consists of five women who reside in the same neighborhood. They are all active in retail trade.

Nene has been selling various products for over 2 years. This is a new group that for the first time is applying for a 500,000 FCFA loan to improve their business.

She is married and a mother, and supports her husband in dealing with household expenses. She wants to diversify her business to maximize her profits.

loans.use: purchase various products for resale

loans.name: Association Dental 17 Group

texts.fr: Le groupement »Association Dental 17 » regroupe 5 femmes qui évoluent dans le commerce. Elles viennent pour la seconde fois solliciter un crédit de 500000FCFA.  Elles ont comme présidente, la dame Oumy, qui fait de la vente de produits divers comme de la pâte d'arachide, de l'huile de palme et tout autre produit qui peut générer un profit. Grâce au crédit, elle pourra développer son activité  afin de pouvoir aider son mari dans la dépense de la maison. Si elle voit son commerce se développer elle pourra penser faire une activité parallèle pour maximiser son profit.
texts.en:
The "Association Dental 17" group comprises five women who are active in commerce. For the second time they are seeking a loan for 500,000 FCFA.

Their president is lady Oumy, who sells various products, such as peanut butter, palm oil and many other products that can generate a profit. Thanks to the loan, she will expand her business so she can help her husband deal with household expenses. If she sees her business grow she may consider starting a parallel activity to maximize her profits.

loans.use: purchase various products for resale: peanut butter, palm oil, etc.

loans.name: Gie Bokk Deggo Group

texts.fr:
Le GIE Book Deggo regroupe 5 femmes  qui évoluent dans le secteur du commerce. Madame Bineta, la présidente du groupe, fait de l’aviculture  depuis maintenant 5 ans. Elle a un marché qui lui permet d’écouler ses poulets dès qu’ils sont à terme et cela lui fait gagner du temps et de l’argent. Avec le crédit, elle pourra augmenter sa capacité de production mais aussi du coté familial, améliorer les conditions alimentaires.
Elle rêve d’avoir un grand poulailler et de l’exploiter à fond.
texts.en:
GIE Bokk Deggo group consists of five women who operate in the commercial sector.

Mrs. Bineta, the group president, has been a poultry farmer for the past five years. She manages her own market which enables her to sell her chickens when they are ready. This saves both time and money.

With the credit loan, she can increase her production capacity, and also improve food conditions for her family.

She dreams of having a large chicken coop and being able to fully exploit it.

loans.use: buy chicks to raise and sell

loans.name: Aissatou
