Mrs. Khady lives close to our branch office. She is 40 years old, married and the mother of four. She sells beads and fabric, and has 26 years of experience in this area. Khady has no dependents because her adolescent children help her with household expenses.
She needs this loan in order to buy beads, incense and T-shirts for resale. She starts her work at 8 AM and ends at 6 PM. In the future, Khady would like to open additional sales points in order to increase her revenues.

loans.use: to buy beads, incense (Thiouraye), fabric, T-shirts and pants for resale.

loans.name: Ndèye Fatou

texts.fr: Madame Ndèye Fatou est agent pénitentiaire de profession ; elle  est âgée de 33 ans et habite aux environs du Guichet. Avec la conjoncture, elle voudra avoir une autre activité parallèle en évoluant dans l’aviculture depuis plus de 3 mois. Elle commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 19h. Elle n’a aucunes charges particulières. Ndèye Fatou voudrait ce prêt d’un montant de 300 000 F pour acheter des poussins et de l’aliment pour les élever et ensuite les revendre. A l’avenir elle souhaite développer son activité en tel point qu’elle  n’aura plus besoin de crédits.
texts.en: Mrs. Ndèye Fatou is a prison warden by profession. She is 33 years old and lives near our branch office. In this economy, she would like to have an additional line of work; since three month ago, she started growing poultry. She starts her day at 8 AM and ends at 19 PM. She has no dependents. Ndèye Fatou would like to obtain this loan of 300,000 West African francs in order to buy chicks and feed for them so as to raise them for resale. In the future she would like to grow her business to the point at which she will manage without further loans.

loans.use: to buy chicks to raise and resell.

loans.name: Mariama

texts.fr: Mariame  est une Femme peulh agée de 53 ans qui vend du lait caillé comme toutes les autres femmes de son village, c’est une tradition en quelque sorte, car à elle seule elle possède un patrimoine de 5 vaches. Elle a une expérience de  5 ans. Elle n’a pas de charge particulière et commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 19. Madame Mariame est mariée et mère de 4 enfants dont le plus âgé a 15 ans et le plus jeune 4 ans. Elle est une habituée de la caisse et à besoin  de ce crédit de 150.000F pour pouvoir  diversifier ses produits et services et améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille. A l’avenir elle souhaite avoir une place fixe et augmenter ses revenus pour ne plus avoir besoin de crédit
texts.en: Mariame is a 53-year old Fulani woman who, like all the other women in her village, sells curdled milk. It is a kind of tradition as she alone has five cows. She has five years' experience. She does not have a specific workload and begins her day at eight in the morning and finishes it at seven in the evening. Mariame is married and mother to four children, the eldest of whom is 15 years of age and the youngest four. She is a regular of the branch and needs this 150,000 francs loan to be able to diversify her products and services as well as to improve her family's living conditions. In the future she would like to have a permanent place and increase her income so that she does not need any more loans.

loans.use: to buy and sell milk in garages and at the bus station.

loans.name: Marième

texts.fr: Marième  est une jeune dame âgée de 31 ans qui fait du commerce depuis 5 ans. Elle gère une cantine de vêtements pour enfants. Elle est mariée et mère de famille. Elle vient solliciter pour la première fois un crédit de 150000FCFA pour renforcer son stock et diversifier son activité.   Elle ne gère pas les dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille , sinon Madame Marième  supporte les charges de location de sa cantine mais aussi les factures d’électricité. Elle aimerait ouvrir une autre boutique dans le marché du quartier pour augmenter son potentiel client.
texts.en: Marième is a young 31-year old woman who has been trading for the past five years. She has a small shop where she sells children's clothing. She is married and a mother and has just requested a first loan of 150,000FCFA so she can boost her stock and diversify her business. She does not manage her family's daily expenditure but pays the rent on her shop and also the electricity bills. She would like to open another shop in the local market to increase her potential customers.

loans.use: to buy children's clothing for resale to her customers.

loans.name: Oumar

texts.fr: Monsieur OUMAR est un agent de sécurité de profession, qui habite  dans le même quartier  que situe le Guichet. Il est marié et père de famille ; agé de 54 ans Monsieur Oumar évolue dans l’aviculture depuis 6 mois. Monsieur  commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 19h. Il gère ses dépenses quotidiennes de sa petite famille et pour améliorer les conditions de vie de ses enfants et les frais scolaires Oumar préfère faire une activité parallèle comme l’aviculture ainsi, il a sollicité ce prêt pour acheter des poussins pour les élever et les revendre dans les restaurants et les universités de la place. A l’avenir il souhaite être le fournisseur le plus grand de la place.
texts.en: Mr. OUMAR is a security guard by trade and lives in the same district as the branch office. He is married and a father. At 54 years of age, Mr. OUMAR has been working in poultry farming for six months. He starts his day at 8 AM and finishes at 7 PM. He manages the day-to-day expenses of his small family. And to improve his children's living conditions and [to cover] their schooling costs, he prefers to have a parallel business such as poultry farming. Thus, he is requesting this loan to purchase chicks to raise and resell to restaurants and local universities. For the future, he would like to be the biggest supplier in the area.

loans.use: to purchase chicks to raise and resell

loans.name: Omar

texts.fr: Monsieur Omar un homme âgé de 31, marié et père de famille. Il est balayeur dans l’une des marchés de la place. Monsieur Omar commence sa journée à 7h du matin et la termine à 13h. Etant soutient de famille il a besoin de ce crédit pour aider son frère qui est dans le besoin social. Avec son salaire Monsieur Omar gère les dépenses quotidiennes de sa petite famille. Il a une expérience de 5 ans dans son activité et souhaite développer son activité pour augmenter ses revenus pour aider sa famille sans même sollicité  crédit
texts.en: Omar is a 31-year old man who is married and a father. He is a roadsweeper in one of the local markets. Omar begins his day at seven o'clock in the morning and finishes at one o'clock in the afternoon. Since he provides for his family, he needs this loan to help his brother who needs social aid. With his salary he manages his small family's daily expenses. He has five years' experience in his work and would like to develop it so that he can increase his income and help his family without taking out loans.

loans.use: to help his brother who is in need.

loans.name: Aminata

texts.fr: Madame Aminata vit au Sénégal. C’est une femme célibataire  qui travaille dans une pâtisserie de la place (la brioche d’orée) comme femme de  ménage depuis pratiquement 01 an. Les revenus  qu’elle gagne lui permettent d’assister financièrement ses parents et de subvenir à ses besoins personnels. Elle est adhérente  à l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC ou  elle sollicite un prêt d’un montant de 75.000 francs CFA. Le  financement  sera destiné  a  aider sa mère à honorer ses engagements quelque part. Son futur projet est d’ouvrir une boutique de cosmétique.
texts.en: Aminata lives in Senegal. She is a single woman who has been working as a cleaner in a local patisserie (La Brioche Dorée) for almost a year. The income she earns enables her to help her parents out financially and to provide for her own needs. She is a member of one of U-IMCEC's branches where she is requesting a 75,000FCFA loan. The loan will be used to help her mother honour certain commitments. Her future ambition is to open a cosmetics shop.

loans.use: to help her mother to honour her commitments.

loans.name: Sekou Mass

texts.fr: Sekou Mass est un enseignant agé de 36 ans célibataire ,il a comme charges bien occuper ses parents. Il est à l'école de 7h50 à 15h15,il évolu depuis 13 ans dans le secteur de l'éducation.Il a bénéfié de 4 crédits dans l'un des guichets de l'imcec ou il est membre.Avec ce crédit Mr sekou Mass va acheter des meubles pour sallon.Il a comme ambition des études supérieures,avoir sa propre femme dans sa propre maison.
texts.en: Sekou Mass is a teacher who is 36 years old and single. His main expenses relate to looking after his parents. He is at school from 7.50 in the morning to 3.15 in the afternoon and has been working in education for the past 13 years. He has had four loans from one of IMCEC's branches where he is a member. With this loan Sekou Mass is going to buy living room furniture. His ambition is to do further studies, have a wife and his own house.

loans.use: to maintain his living room and buy furniture.

loans.name: Anne Fran9Oise

texts.fr: Anne Françoise est couturière,célibataire avec un enfant elle est âgée de 43 ans .Elle évolue depuis 15 ans dans la couture ,elle démarre sa journée de 8h à 22h .Anne Françoise a une charge deux personnes lui et son papa .Le seul fils qu'elle a dans sa vie ,vit aux États Unis Avec ce crédits elle veut renforcer son fonds de roulement en faisant une mercerie dans son atelier de travail . Elle a comme ambition faire une grande mercerie dans sa localité.
texts.en:
Anne Françoise is a seamstress. She is 43 years old and single, with one child. 

Anne Françoise has been working in the sewing business for 15 years, and works from 8am to 10pm. She looks after two people, herself and her father. Her only son lives in the United States. 

With this loan, Anne Françoise would like to increase her working capital by setting up a shop selling sewing supplies in her workshop. Her ambition is to set up a large sewing shop in her area.

loans.use: to build up working capital for sewing supplies.

loans.name: Binta

texts.fr: Binta habite au Sénégal dans la région du Sud , âgée de 31 ans divorcée sans enfants , elle s'active dans le commerce des légumes , du piments , des poissons séchés et fumés depuis 7 ans . Grâce aux bénéfice de cette activité ,elle assure ses dépenses quotidienne plus la location de sa chambre . Elle avait 1 prêt de 200 000f au prés de son guichet de l'U-IMCEC ou elle est membre , qu'elle a remboursé intégralement.Elle sollicite un nouveau crédit de 200 000f pour acheter des produits qu'elle commercialise . Elle a comme ambition de se déplacer dans les marchés hebdomadaires pour écouler rapidement sa marchandise .
texts.en:
Binta lives in the south of Senegal. She is 31 years old, divorced and has no children. 

For seven years, Binta has been running a business selling vegetables, spices, and dried and smoked fish. With the proceeds from this business, she is able to meet her daily expenses and pay the rent on her room. 

Binta already received a loan of 200 000 francs from the branch of UIMCEC where she is a member, which she repaid in full. She is requesting another loan of 200 000 francs to purchase the goods she will sell as part of her business. She would like to travel around the daily markets in order to sell her goods more quickly.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and smoked fish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cashew nuts and plant cashews.

loans.name: Bintou

texts.fr: Madame Bintou  habite au Sénégal. Elle est divorcée et elle gère ses charges personnelles grâce a l’activité de  commerce qu’elle pratique depuis  05 ans. Elle est spécialisée dans la vente de produits cosmétiques, de tissus et de chaussure. En plus, dans le souci de diversifier son activité  elle a démarré depuis un an  la vente de poissons fumés. Elle est membre de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC d’où elle sollicite ce crédit de 300.000 francs CFA pour acheter des chaussures pour enfants et des produits cosmétique à revendre. L’objectif visé est de renforcer le stock de produits cosmétiques qui se trouve dans sa boutique localisée dans le marché situé  non loin de sa zone d’habitation. Ce crédit lui permettra de mieux satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle et d’augmenter ses revenus. Toutes fois, elle a l’intention de continuer à réinvestir ses bénéfices dans son activité pour renforcer son fond de roulement. Son futur projet est d’acquérir un magasin plus grand et commencer la vente d’articles marocains.
texts.en:
Mrs. Bintou lives in Senegal. She's divorced and provides for herself thanks to the money earning business she's been running for five years. She specializes in selling cosmetics, fabrics, and shoes. In addition, wanting to diversify her business, she started selling smoked fish one year ago.

She's a member of one of U-IMCEC's local branches, from which she's seeking this loan to buy children's shoes and cosmetics to resell. Her goal is to bolster her stock of cosmetics, which she keeps in her shop, located at the market, not far from where she lives.

This loan will enable her to better meet customer demand and increase her earnings. Nevertheless, she intends to continue to reinvest her profits in her business, in order to strengthen her working capital.

In the futures, she plans to purchase a bigger shop and start selling products from Morocco.

loans.use: to buy children's shoes, cosmetics, and fabrics to resell

loans.name: Kady

texts.fr: Madame Kady est une femme mariée qui demeure au Sénégal depuis plusieurs années. Elle est technicienne de surface depuis un an maintenant. Elle est adhérente de  l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC  ou  elle sollicite  un crédit de 200.000 francs CFA. Elle veut acheter un réfrigérateur pour se lancer dans la vente d’eau fraiche et de jus de fruits. Son ambition est d’accroitre ses revenus à travers cette nouvelle activité qu’elle exerce. Ainsi il sera en mesure de renforcer le niveau de son épargne et contribuer a l’amélioration des conditions de vie de sa famille. Son projet futur est d’acquérir sa propre maison et améliorer le cadre de vie de sa famille.
texts.en: Kady is a married woman who has been living in Senegal for several years. She has been working as a cleaner for a year. She is a member of one of the UIMCEC branches where she is requesting a loan of 200 000 francs. She would like to buy a fridge so that she can start a business selling fresh water and fruit juices. Her aim is to increase her income by starting this new business. She will then be able to build up her savings and contribute to the improvement of her family's living conditions. Her future plans are to buy her own house and improve her family's living environment.

loans.use: to buy a fridge so that she can start a business selling water and juices.

loans.name: Moussa

texts.fr: Monsieur Moussa vit au Sénégal. C’est un homme marié qui évolue dans   la couture pour gagner sa vie. Cela fait plus de 15 ans qu’il exerce cette activité de tailleur ce  qui lui donne l’opportunité de  satisfaire une bonne partie  des besoins de sa famille. Il est membre de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC au sein duquel il a déjà remboursé    05 crédits antérieurs. De nouveau, il sollicite un prêt d’un montant de 250.000 francs CFA prévu  pour acheter une machine à coudre afin de  mieux développer son activité. Il espère avec ce financement accroitre les revenus qu’il gagne a travers son activité ce qui lui permettra de relever le niveau de son épargne et aussi   rendre meilleur les conditions alimentaires de sa famille. Son futur projet est d’ouvrir un grand atelier pour arriver à réaliser son rêve de devenir un grand styliste.
texts.en:
Mr. Moussa lives in Senegal. He is married and for more than 15 years, he's been working as a tailor to earn a living. This gives him the opportunity to provide for most of his family's needs.

He is a member of the local branch of Kiva's partner, U-IMCEC, from which he already obtained and repaid five loans. He's now seeking a new loan of XOF 250'000 to buy a sewing machine, in order to expand his business.

Thanks to this loan, he hopes to increase the income he earns through his business. This will enable him to bolster his savings and improve the standard of living of his family.

In the future, he intends to open a large workshop in order to realize his dream of becoming a great stylist.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Babacar

texts.fr: Monsieur Babacar est un habitant du Sénégal. Il évolue dans le secteur de l’assurance en tant que courtier et exerce cette profession depuis 2011.  Il est célibataire et gère ses charges personnelles  (nourriture,  loyer,  factures et   besoins personnels) grâce aux revenus que lui procure son activité. Il est membre de  l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC  ou il a déjà  bénéficié d’un crédit antérieur. Il sollicite à nouveau un crédit de 350.000 francs CFA ; une partie du financement sera destiné  a l’acquisition  d’une photocopieuse  et  l’autre partie sera utilisé pour  réaménager son bureau pour le rendre plus attractif et mieux rentabiliser  son activité. De ce fait, avec l’augmentation de ses gains, il pourra faire des économies qui pourront  lui permettre d’approfondir ses études en assurance et d’ouvrir d’autres cabinets de courtages en assurance.
texts.en:
Babacar lives in Senegal. He has been working as a broker in the insurance sector since 2011. He is single and is able to manage his personal expenses (food, rent, bills, and personal needs) thanks to the income from his business.

He is a member of a branch of the U-IMCEC, through which he has already received a loan in the past. He is once again seeking a loan of 350,000 FCFA. He will use part of the loan to acquire a photocopier, and the rest will be used to refurbish his office in order to make it more attractive and to make his business more cost effective.

With the increase in profit, he will be able to put money aside to use for continuing his studies in insurance and opening other insurance brokerage offices.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier and refurbish his office

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing for resale.

loans.name: Mbaye

texts.fr: Monsieur Mbaye habite au Sénégal. C’est un  homme marié qui prend soin des charges de nourriture, de loyer et de paiement de factures pour  sa famille grâce aux revenus qui découlent de  son activité de commerce dans le domaine de la  quincaillerie ou il capitalise une expérience de 10 ans déjà. Il est membre de  l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC où Il a déjà obtenu 03 crédits antérieurs. C’est grâce à ces crédits obtenus à son guichet à l’U-IMCEC qu’il a réussi à ouvrir  son propre  magasin de quincaillerie. Il souhaite développer son activité de commerce en renforçant son fond de roulement, raison pour laquelle elle sollicite un prêt de 300 000 prévu pour l’achat de peinture, de matériels de plomberie et fils électriques pour es besoins de son commerce. Son objectif est de répondre a la demande de plus en plus croissante de sa clientèle. L’accroissement de ses bénéfices lui permettra de démarrer le commerce de ciment et aussi améliorer davantage les conditions alimentaires de sa famille. Le projet qu’il souhaite entamer prochainement est l’élargissement du magasin pour augmenter sa contenance et s’engager dans la distribution en gros.
texts.en: Mbaye lives in Senegal. He is a married man who takes care of the food expenses, the rent and the bills for his family thanks to the income generated by his hardware business, a business in which he has 10 years experience already. He is a member of one of the UIMCEC branches and has already received 3 previous loans. It is thanks to these loans from his UIMCEC branch that he was able to open his own hardware store. He would like to develop his business by increasing his working capital, which is why he is requesting a loan of 300 000 francs with which to buy paint, plumbing materials and electrical cables for his business. His aim is to meet his ever-increasing customer demand. The growth of his profits will allow him to start selling cement and also to improve his family's food conditions further. The next project he would like to get started on is the expansion of his store to increase its capacity, and to get started in the wholesale business.

loans.use: to buy products for his hardware store.

loans.name: Cheikh   Atab

texts.fr: Cheikh Atab marié habite au sud Sénégal , membre de l'un des guichets de l'U IMCEC depuis 2 ans . Il évolue dans le transport depuis 9 ans , avec ses propres moyens il a acheté son 1er véhicule de transport . Il sollicite un crédit de 700 000f pour complément achat d'un autre véhicule de transport afin de mieux développer son transport,augmenter le nombre d’employés et épargner de l'argent . Il a comme ambition achat des bus de transport de touristes .
texts.en:
Cheikh Atab is married and lives in southern Senegal. He's been a member of one of U-IMCEC's local branches for two years. He's been in the transportation business for nine years.  He bought his first vehicle using his own money.

He's seeking a loan to buy another transportation vehicle, in order to better develop his transportation business, increase his number of employees, and save money.

He ambitions to buy buses to transport tourists.

loans.use: to buy a second vehicle

loans.name: Oumou Samba

texts.fr: Madame OUMOU est une grande dame âgée de 65 ans qui est teinturière de profession et qui évolue dans vente des tissus teints. Elle a une expérience de 30ans dans son activité, mariée et mère de 03 grands enfants âgés entre 40 35 et 25 ans. Elle gère ses charges familiales. Elle commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 12h. OUMOU sollicite ce prêt pour augmenter son stock de marchandises et subvenir aux besoins de ses clients. A l'avenir elle souhaite ouvrir un boutique pour améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille et pérenniser son activité.
texts.en:
Mrs. Oumou is a great 65-year-old lady who is a dyer by profession and is involved in selling dyed fabrics. She has 30 years' experience in the business.

She is married and mother of three children aged 40, 35 and 25 years. She manages her family responsibilities.

She starts her day at 8 am to finish at 12 noon. Mrs. Oumou is requesting this loan to increase her stock of goods and meet the needs of her customers.

In the future she wants to open a shop to improve her family's living conditions and sustain her business.

loans.use: Buy fabrics to be dyed and resold to her customers

loans.name: Mariata

texts.fr: Madame Mariata est une femme agée de 35, mariée et mère de de 3 enfants, elle habite à quelques kilomètres deu Guichet.Son activité principal est le commerce de tissus qu'elle pratique depuis 4ans. C'est elle qui gère ses charges personnelles et aide son mari dans la gestion des dépenses de sa petite famille.Elle commence sa journée à 16h pour la terminer à 19h de l'après midi car elle s'occupe des travaux ménagers dans la matinée.Elle a besoin de ce prét pour augmenter son stock  de marchandises très prisés par ses clients. Elle souhaiterait avec l'aide de l'imcec ouvrir une boutique de prêt à porter et diversifier son activité.
texts.en:
Mrs. Mariata is a 35-year-old woman, married with three children. She lives a few kilometers from the branch office. Her main activity is trading fabrics which she has done for the past four years.

She manages her personal expenses and helps her husband in managing family expenditures..

She starts her day at 4 pm to finish at 7 pm because she takes care of household chores in the morning.

She needs this loan to increase her stock of goods, which are highly valued by her customers. With help from IMCEC she would like to open a shop selling ready-to-wear clothes, and diversify her activity.

loans.use: Buy and sell fabrics

loans.name: Marième

texts.fr: Madame Marième est une femme qui habite aux environs du Guichet. Elle est agée de 32 ans mariée et mère de 03 enfants agés entre 24 et 17ans. Marième évolue dans le commerce de tissus depuis 10 ans et commence sa journée à 9h pour le terminer à 22h.Elle aide son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes et paye les frais d'scolarité de ses enfants.Elle sollicite ce crédit pour augmenter son stock de tissus qu'elle revende à ses clients. A l'avenir elle souhaite ouvrir une boutique d'alimentation générale pour pouvoir améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mrs. Marième is a woman who lives near the branch office. She is 32 years old, married with three children whose ages range from 17 to 24 years.

Marième has been active in the textile business for the past ten years and starts her day at 9 am to finish at 10 pm. She helps her husband with daily expenses and pays her children's tuition fees. 

She is requesting this loan to increase the stock of fabric she resells to her customers. In the future she wants to open a grocery store to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: Buy fabrics and shoes for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buy zinc roofing for his house

loans.name: El Hadji

texts.fr: Monsieur El Hadji est un homme qui habite aux environs du Guichet; il est agé de 45 ans et évolue dans le commerce de détail de produits alimentaires.Il a une expérience de 12ans dans son activité. El Hadji est marié et père de 5 enfants, c'est lui seul qui gère les dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille et les frais d'scolarité de ses enfants.Avec ce crédit il souhaite acheter des produits alimentaires comme le savon, le riz, l'huile, le sucre et du lait qu'il va revendre à ses clients. Il ouvre sa boutique à 7h du matin pour la refermer à 23h du soir.A l'avenir il veut avec l'augmentation de ses revenus renforcer son fond de roulement.
texts.en:
Mr. El Hadji is a 45-year-old man who lives near the branch office. He has been active in the retail sales of food products with over 12 years' experience in the business.

El Hadji is married with five children. He handles by himself the daily household expenses and tuition fees of his children.

With the loan he wants to buy grocery items like soap, rice, oil, sugar and milk he will then resell to his customers. He opens his shop at 7 am to close in the evening at 11 pm.

In the future, with increasing revenues, he wants to strengthen his working capital.

loans.use: Buy and sell commodities such as rice, oil, sugar and milk, because he has a shop

loans.name: Khadidiatou Harouna

texts.fr: Madame Khadidiatou est une femme qui est agée de 42ans, marié et mère de 07 enfants habite dans le meme quartier que le Guichet.Elle évolue dans le commerce de tissus et elle a une expérience de 13ans dans son activité. Ses charges sont les dépenss quotidiennes de sa famille qu'elle gère avec son mari. Elle sollicite ce prêt pour acheter des tissus comme les bazins, wax, et les tissus légers (Khartoum)très prisés dans cette localité.A cause des travaux ménagers, Khadidiatou commence son activité à 16h de l'après midi pour ne revenir à la maison qu'à 19h. A l'avenir elle souhaite ouvrir une boutique de prêt à porter pour pouvoir augmenter ses revenus et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa grande famille
texts.en:
Khadidiatou is a 42-year-old woman, married, and a mother of seven children. She lives in the same area as a branch [of UIMCEC]. She sells fabrics and has an experience of 13 years in this domain. She manages her family's everyday expenses with her husband.

She is asking for this loan to buy damask fabrics, high quality fabrics, and light fabrics (Khartoum) which are very popular in this area. 

Because of household work, Khadidiatou starts her business at 4 p.m. in the afternoon and doesn't return home until 7 p.m. 

In the future, she would like to open a shop of ready-to-wear clothing in order to increase her earnings and improve the living conditions of her large family.

loans.use: to buy fabrics to resell

loans.name: Hawa

texts.fr:
Madame Hawa est une dame de 56 ans, mariée et  mère de 08 enfants dont l’ainé a 28 ans et le cadet ,14 ans. Elle fait du commerce depuis 3 ans, en vendant des tissus spécialement un  tissu très doux appelé « Khartoum » qui  est l’habit le plus porté en Mauritanie ; c’est d’ailleurs là bas qu’elle se ravitaille.
Elle est entrée dans le commerce par amour et aimerai développer son activité et la diversifier. C’est pourquoi elle demande un crédit de 200000 FCFA. Elle appui son mari dans la gestion du foyer en s’occupant des frais de scolarité de ses enfants .Dans l’avenir, elle aimerait acquérir une boutique de prêt à porter. Elle commence sa journée à 16h pour la terminer à 19h
texts.en:
Hawa is a 56-year-old woman.  She is married and the mother of eight children between the ages of 28 and 14. She has been involved in retail for three years.  She sells fabrics, particularly a very fine type of fabric called "Khartoum", which is the most commonly worn fabric in Mauritania.  Hawa actually buys her merchandise in Mauritania.

Hawa decided to start in this business because she had a passion for it.  She would now like to develop and diversify her activity.  This is why she is requesting a loan of 200,000 CFA francs.  

Hawa, who pays her children's school fees, helps her husband cover the household expenses.  In the future, she would like to own a shop and sell ready-to-wear clothes.  She works from 4 PM until 7 PM.

loans.use: to buy damask and wax fabrics for resale.

loans.name: Sope Samasse Group

texts.fr:
Le groupement SOPE SAMASSE  regroupe 5 femmes qui font toute du commerce . Elles se sont regroupées  parce qu'elles vivent dans la meme maison et issues d'une meme famille.
La présidente, madame Bineta agée de 35ans, exerce le métier de restaurant depuis plus de 02 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de famille. Son activité consiste à vendre des repas dans l'après à cause de ses travaux ménagers. Elle démarre sa journée  à 18 h et l’a fini à 22 h. Ses efforts ne sont pas veine car elle réussit à épargner de l’argent, mais aussi à aider dans la dépense quotidienne de la maison. Elle a comme projet futur de trouver une cantine sur la route nationale pour pouvoir plus mettre en valeur  son restaurant et acquérir  une clientèle plus diversifiée et  plus nombreuse
texts.en:
The Sope Samasse group is composed of five women all of whom work as vendors. They have formed a group together because they live in the same house and are relatives.

The group’s leader, Mrs. Bineta, 35 years old, has been cooking food for sale for over two years. She is married with children. She sells cooked food in the evening, after her house work is done. She starts selling day at 6 PM and ends at 10 PM. Her efforts are rewarded as she manages to save some money and also help cover everyday household needs. Her future plans include opening an eatery along the national highway in order to take better advantage of her food business and attract a  larger and more diversified customer base.

loans.use: to buy food items such as rice and oil to cook food for sale in the eatery she operates.

loans.name: Gpf Rewbe Guindy Group

texts.fr:
Agée de 35 ans, madame Coumba est la présidente du groupe de crédit appelé Rewbe REWBE GUINDY qui se compose de 04 femmes qui habitent dans le même quartier et qui s’activent dans des activités génératrices de revenus. Cela fait 13 ans maintenant qu’elle vend des légumes. Elle commence sa journée à 8h pour finir à 12h.
Grace au crédit, elle peut diversifier son activité   et améliorer son commerce en augmentant son stock de marchandises. Agée de 35 ans elle est mariée et malheureusement elle n'a pas d'enfants
Madame Coumba veut réaliser un jour, un vieux rêve de jeunesse, celui d’ouvrir une ferme d'élevage.
texts.en:
Coumba, aged 35, is the leader of the credit group called REWBE GUINDY.  The group consists of four women who live in the same neighborhood and who are actively involved in income-generating activities.  

Coumba has been selling vegetables for 13 years now, working from 8 AM until 12 PM.  Thanks to this loan, she will be able to diversify her activity, increase her stock of merchandise and therefore improve her business.  She is 35 years old, married, but unfortunately she does not have any children.

Coumba would like to see her childhood dream come true one day: she would like to open a farm and raise livestock.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for resale at the market.

loans.name: Mbaye Thiam

texts.fr: Mlle Mbaye Thiam, âgée de 29 ans est une jeune fille commerçante de par l’âge mais aussi l’expérience dans ce domaine puisqu’elle en a qu’un an. Elle est célibataire qui a un enfant de 6ans, et en est à sa première expérience de crédit. Avec ce dernier elle pourra acheter des poussins et de l'aliment pour pouvoir les élever et ensuite les  revendre dans le quartier et les environs ou elle possède une clientèle pas mal. A partir de là elle pourra commencer à épargner et penser sérieusement à son avenir. Sa principale charge est l'scolarité de sa fille et ses charges personnelles. Comme projet futur, elle désire élargir son activité et surtout la diversifier et améliorer sa condition de vie et celle de sa fille.
texts.en:
Mrs. Mbaye Thiam, age 29, is a young merchant. She only has one year of experience in this field. She's unmarried and has one six-year-old child.

This is her first loan experience. She will use her loan to buy chicks and food in order to raise the chicks and resell them in her neighborhood, where she has a substantial clientele.

From there, she will be able to put money away and think seriously about her future. Her main expenses are her daughter's education and her personal expenses.

Her future project is to expand and diversify her business, and improve her standard of living and that of her daughter.

loans.use: to buy chicks and food to raise the chicks and sell the chicken

loans.name: Florentino

texts.es: Don florentino de 46 años de edad  es muy amable y trabajador, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos, El trabaja muy duro en su propia parcela donde siembra maiz y frijol; sus productos son de muy buena calidad cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en el granero que muestra la fotografia para luego salir a comercializarla a los diferentes mercados que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia. Florentino  solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para contar con el dinero necesario e invertir en la compra de insumos agrícolas como controles de plaga y fertilizantes, abonos, semillas entre otras cosas que necesita para su siembra, él ansía aumentar sus ventas para poder percibir mayores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Florentino is 46 years old, he lives with his wife and their three children, and he is a very nice and hardworking person. He works really hard on his own land, where he plants corn and beans; his are good quality products, and when his crops are ready he stores them in the granary shown in the picture. He then goes to the different markets located close to his community to sell his products.
Florentino is requesting a loan to INTEGRAL in order to have the money he needs to invest it in the purchase of farming supplies such as pest-control substances, fertilizers, manure, seeds and other items he needs for his crops. He longs to increase his sales in order to earn a better income, thus granting his family a better economic stability.

loans.use: To buy pest-control substances, fertilizers, manure and seeds.

loans.name: Ely

texts.en:
Ely is a 60-year-old widow with two children. She lives in Sebarok, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental.

She is doing farming and harvesting coconuts for sale to earn a living. She has been doing this activity for ten years, and has 5,000 PHP as her monthly income. 

In 2008, she joined GDMPC to gain access to microfinance. Currently, she borrowed 10,000 PHP from GDMPC to purchase more coconuts in the neighborhood for sale. 

Ely plans to cultivate her cocoland to increase their income.

loans.use: to purchase more coconuts for sale.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita tiene 62 años de edad, esta acompañada y tiene tres hijos de 25, 18 y 14 años de edad respectivamente. Se dedica a los oficios domésticos y al cuidado de  su casa; ya que se preocupa por tener su casa limpia y en buenas condiciones para vivir y  que su familia pueda tener las condiciones adecuadas, la señora no tiene un trabajo que le pueda generar ingresos; ya que no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, debido a que sus padres eran pobres y no pudieron darles los estudios para que pudiera tener un trabajo y lo único que se dedica es cuidar a su familia desde sus 24 años, pero la señora se preocupa para que sus hijos tengan la oportunidad de superarse con esfuerzo y puedan alcanzar sus estudios; ya que ella no la tuvo pero quiere que su hijos tengan esa oportunidad de superarse.


El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 10 Laminas, 16 Reglas, 8 Cuartones de 3 Metros, 4 Cuartones de 6 Metros, 3 Cuartones de 2.5 Metros, 1 Libra de clavos, para mejorar el techo ya que se acerca el invierno. Con la inversión mejorara su condición de vida teniendo una vivienda en optimas condiciones; ya que en estos momentos se encuentra en mal estado el techo su casa se encuentra en condiciones no favorables para vivir tanto para  ella  y su familia son mas propensas a cualquier enfermedad;  ya que se acerca la época lluviosa y con el crédito la señora mejorara su casa y tenerla  en optimas condiciones de vida y mas segura.
texts.en:
Margarita, age 62, is in a relationship and has three children, ages 25, 18, and 14.  She devotes herself to the domestic tasks and the care of her home.  She takes care of having her house clean and in good living conditions so that her family is able to have adequate conditions.  She does not have a job that is able to generate income for her.  She did not have the opportunity to go to school because her parents were poor, and they could not give her an education so that she would be able to have a job.  The only thing she has done since she was 24 is take care of her family.

She is eager for her children to have the opportunity, with effort, to succeed and that they are able to have an education.  This is because she did not have one, but she wants her children to have the opportunity to improve themselves.

The loan that she is requesting from the Fundación Campo is to buy 10 metal sheets, 16 boards, 8 three meter beams, 4 six meter beams, 3 two and a half meter beams, and a pound of nails.  She will buy these materials in order to improve her roof because winter is coming.  With the investment she will improve her living condition by having a house in optimal condition.  The roof of her house is in a bad state, and the living conditions are not good for her or her family.  They are more apt to get an illness because the rainy season is coming.  She will use the loan to improve her house and to have it in optimal living conditions and safer.

loans.use: to buy supplies to improve her roof.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and other farming supplies.

loans.name: Leonidas

texts.es: Leonidas, tiene 32 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja con quien tiene  cuatro hijos, reside en una aldea del municipio de Jesús de Otoro, Comayagua. El siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura, lleva dos años de dedicarse a cultivar su propia finca de café. La producción la vende en el mercado local. Ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 7,000 Lempiras para comprar fertilizantes y poder darle buena asistencia al cultivo de café. Con esta inversión espera sacar buena producción este año. Su meta es seguir ayudando a sus hijos con las necesidades básicas y que puedan estudiar.
texts.en:
Leonidas, 32, lives in a common law relationship with his spouse with whom he has four children.  He likes in a village in Jesús de Otoro municipality, Comayagua.  He’s always worked in agriculture and has been working his own coffee farm for two years.  He sells his crop in the local market.  

He’s decided to request a 7,000 Lempira loan to buy fertilizer to provide good care for his coffee crop.  With this investment he hopes to produce a good crop yield this year.  His goal is to continue helping his children with their basic needs and so that they can attend school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and manure for his coffee crop.

loans.name: Cristhian Guadalupe

texts.es:
Christian, 30 años de edad , casada,  de oficio comerciante , es dueña de una pulpería, tiene 2 hijos de 12 y 10 años de edad ambos están estudiando. Su primera experiencia como comerciante fue a los 28 años de edad con unos ahorros que tenía y apoyo de su marido compro granos básicos y productos de limpieza no tenía mucho productos pues necesitaba más capital para comprar esta idea la traía en mente desde pequeña pues se crio con sus abuelos quienes tenían una pulpería grande. Le gustó la idea y decidió poner ella su propio negocio con el cual tiene 2 años.
Está requiriendo el financiamiento para comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, jabón, gaseosas, productos lácteos, adornos y cosméticos alusivos al día de las madres. Desea comprar vitrinas para exhibir sus productos este es uno de sus metas próximas además de lograr tener una pulpería grande como la que tenían sus abuelos.
texts.en:
Christian, 30, is married and a merchant by profession; she owns a grocery store.  She has two children aged 12 and 10 who are attending school.  

Her first experience as a merchant was at the age of 28.  She used some saving she had and support from her husband to buy basic grains and cleaning supplies.  She didn’t have many products because she needed more capital to buy them.  She’s had this idea since she was little because she was raised by her grandparents who had a large grocery store.  She liked the idea and decided to start her own business; she’s now had it for two years.

She needs financing to buy rice, sugar, oil, soap, soft-drinks, dairy products, decorations and cosmetics for Mother’s Day.  She wants to buy display cases to exhibit her goods.  This is one of her next goals in addition to having a large grocery store like the one her grandparents had.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Neftali

texts.es: Neftali  vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo en casa propia, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y eso le  ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, sus cosechas las comercia en los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefiere por la calidad, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el buen servicio; el necesita invertir por eso le solicita un crédito que le permita comprar semillas de maíz, frijol, insecticida, herbicida, etc. Neftalí tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos, y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Neftali lives with his life partner and his son in his own house.  He grows corn and beans.  He has been working in agriculture for several years.  This has rewarded him with a lot of experience, which allows him to get better harvests.  He sells his harvests in the areas surrounding his community.

He now has a lot of clientele who prefer him for the quality, the good prices, and above all, the good service.

He needs to invest, and that is why he is requesting a loan.  The loan will allow him to buy corn and bean seeds, insecticide, and herbicide, etc.

Neftalí has good payment references from the people who know him, and he is very responsible.  He affirms that he will be able to repay the debt in the established time period.  He also trusts that he will bring financial security to his household.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, insecticide, and herbicide, etc.
